lesson.title: The DeFi Ecosystem
lesson.objective: Explore multiple contracts and understand composability

sections.content: DeFi is not one protocol - it's an ecosystem of specialized building blocks. Lending protocols, DEXs, vaults, bridges - each serves a specific function. Together, they compose into complex financial systems.
Interacting with 3+ contracts teaches you that DeFi is modular. Protocols plug into each other. Your tokens can flow from a vault to a DEX to a lending protocol, each step adding utility.

content: Composability = protocols building on other protocols
Each contract type has specific functions and risks
Exploring widely builds mental models of the ecosystem
The same tokens can be used across many protocols

questions.question: What does 'composability' mean in DeFi?
options: Protocols can only work in isolation
Protocols can integrate and build on each other
All protocols use the same code
Protocols must be approved by a central authority

questions.question: Why is exploring multiple contracts valuable?
options: It builds understanding of the ecosystem

unlockHint: Interact with 3 or more protocol contracts
